summary: DOD is replacing the Air Force's Minuteman III missile—which is over 50 years old—with the new Sentinel system. The transition is the most complex project the service has undertaken. But the Air Force hasn't developed a risk management plan for this transition. A risk management plan would outline how to anticipate, analyze, and solve problems. Also, the Air Force may need to operate Minuteman III...
title: ICBM Modernization: Air Force Actions Needed to Expeditiously Address Critical Risks to Sentinel Transition
